name: Turn Based Demo
description:
Created based on CodeMonkey's GameDev.tv course
Intermediate level - Unity C#
---------------------------
WASD - move
Mouse wheel - zoom
Q/E - rotate

Select a toon by clicking on it, then select an action.
When you are out of movement points click end turn.
---------------------------
ALT-F4 to close

There are no menu screens at this stage, just the game scene.
